originalText.text: I been coming to this Jackson Hewitt for over 20 year to see Victor. He's the best tax preparer in the world. Plus his daughter has an amazing voice. 5 stars all day.

text.text: I been coming to this Jackson Hewitt for over 20 year to see Victor. He's the best tax preparer in the world. Plus his daughter has an amazing voice. 5 stars all day.

originalText.text: What an amazing, professional, and knowledgeable staff this office have! Raquel prepared my taxes and did such an amazing job. I am so happy with my refund! Before Raquel I was getting low refunds, now is so much better!! I highly recommend her! I will be coming here for years to come!

text.text: What an amazing, professional, and knowledgeable staff this office have! Raquel prepared my taxes and did such an amazing job. I am so happy with my refund! Before Raquel I was getting low refunds, now is so much better!! I highly recommend her! I will be coming here for years to come!

originalText.text:
I had been looking for the right tax preparer for years. Finally I decided to go to
Jackson Hewitt. This is where I met Raquel Guzman, her customer service is exceptional with great communication and an understanding that most tax filers are not that comfortable with thinking about taxes. The process was simplified and all I had to do was  share my documentation. Even though it was busy she gave me an ample amount of time to  talk through any questions of concerns.

Looking forward to working with Raquel and the Jackson Hewitt team again in the near future!

originalText.text: I got referred here by my boy! Best decision I ever made! I been coming here for 3 years now and every year it’s the best experience! Raquel is the person I go to every year!! She is smart, she answers all my questions and she knows her stuff!! She’s so professional and so good at what she does! I refer all my friends and family here because they are truly the best!!

originalText.text: 3582 Broadway location, tax preparer (Raquel Guzman) I love coming to see Raquel she makes sure that all my papers are in order and that I get the refund I deserve. I have been coming to her for years and I will continue to come to her as long as she is still with the Jackson Hewitt family. If she leaves then I’m following her. Love you Raquel and thank you so much for always looking out for me.
